entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 6:30 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023
